content:
RibbonGallery Class

Definition

Represents a menu that displays a set of related items or commands in a visually rich format that can be organized into multiple categorized subsets.

In this Article

[System.Windows.StyleTypedProperty(Property="AllFilterItemContainerStyle", StyleTargetType=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem))]
[System.Windows.StyleTypedProperty(Property="FilterItemContainerStyle", StyleTargetType=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem))]
[System.Windows.StyleTypedProperty(Property="GalleryItemStyle", StyleTargetType=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem))]
[System.Windows.StyleTypedProperty(Property="ItemContainerStyle", StyleTargetType=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory))]
[System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="ItemsPresenter", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter))]
[System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="PART_FilterMenuButton", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton))]
[System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="PART_ScrollViewer", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer))]
[System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="PART_FilterContentPane", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter))]
public class RibbonGallery : System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl, Microsoft.Windows.Input.IPreviewCommandSource, System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource, System.Windows.IWeakEventListener

Ribbon gallery in a combo box

Properties

AllFilterItem

Gets the filter that returns all items in a ribbon gallery.

public static object AllFilterItem { get; }
Value
Object

The filter that returns all items in a ribbon gallery.

Remarks

If you implement a custom FilterItemTemplateSelector or FilterItemContainerStyleSelector, you can use this property to distinguish between "All" filter items and custom filter items.

AllFilterItemContainerStyle

Gets or sets the style that is applied to items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.

public System.Windows.Style AllFilterItemContainerStyle { get; set; }
Value
Style

The style that is applied to items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field AllFilterItemContainerStyleProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

AllFilterItemTemplate

Gets or sets the DataTemplate that is used to display items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.

public System.Windows.DataTemplate AllFilterItemTemplate { get; set; }
Value
DataTemplate

A template that specifies the visualization of the items. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field AllFilterItemTemplateProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

CanAddToQuickAccessToolBarDirectly

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar.

public bool CanAddToQuickAccessToolBarDirectly { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar; otherwise, false. The registered default is true. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field CanAddToQuickAccessToolBarDirectlyProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

CanUserFilter

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a user can apply a filter to gallery items.

public bool CanUserFilter { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if a filter can be applied to gallery items; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field CanUserFilterProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

CategoryStyle

Gets or sets the style that is applied to the RibbonGalleryCategory element generated for each item.

public System.Windows.Style CategoryStyle { get; set; }
Value
Style

The style that is applied to the container element generated for each item. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

If this property value is not null, it overrides the ItemContainerStyle property.
